def check_sum(s):
    """"""
    total = sum((ord(char) for char in s))

def check_sum(s):
    """Returns "even" or "odd" based on whether the sum of the Unicode values of each character in the string is even or odd."""
    total = sum((ord(char) for char in s))
    return 'even' if total % 2 != 0 else 'odd'
